definition: the Yongjiang river 甬江[Yong3 jiang1] through Ningbo 寧波|宁波[Ning2 bo1]/abbr. for Ningbo
variant of 桶[tong3], bucket/(classifier) cubic dry measure (5 pecks 五斗, approx half-liter)
path screened by walls on both sides
to feel distressed about sth/heartache/cardiac pain
delighted/to one's heart's content/straightforward/also pr. [tong4 kuai5]

sentences.english: My heart is not pain, but pain has long been numb.
sentences.chinese: 我的心一点也不痛，而是早已痛的麻木了。

sentences.english: Forget pain, very not a scar.
I feel pain here whenever I drink something cold .
sentences.chinese: 我只要一喝冷的东西就觉得这里痛。

sentences.english: Can these activities sightly release my pain？
sentences.chinese: 这些能稍微缓释我的痛吗？

sentences.english: Did not have painful apprehension, thick nature is meddlesome .
sentences.chinese: 没有了痛的顾虑，粗自然是好事了。

sentences.english: I have been having an earache for about a week.
sentences.chinese: 我的耳朵已经痛了一个星期了。

sentences.english: Abdominal tenderness is noted, and pelvic examination reveals cervical motion tenderness.
sentences.chinese: 腹部压痛明显，盆腔检查提示宫颈摇摆痛。

sentences.english: The tooth hurts only when he bites down on it.
Love and hate love, pain and sorrow of the dispute, we do.
sentences.chinese: 爱与恨的缠绵，痛与悲的纠葛，我们之间的离愁。

sentences.english: Ache is achy , miss is achy , too .
sentences.chinese: 渴望是痛，思念也是一种痛。

sentences.english: Ache is achy , miss is achy , too .
sentences.chinese: 渴望是痛，思念也是一种痛。

sentences.english: Swollen feet and possibly leg and back pain.
Vascular pain, leg pain, can not go.
Your love is a dream, but there is real pain.
sentences.chinese: 你的爱是个梦，却有真实的痛。

sentences.english: We pigged out on potato chips and cookies until our bellies ached.
sentences.chinese: 大吃薯条和曲奇，吃到肚子撑到痛为止。

sentences.english: Only Huoquan treat spinal pain and heel pain.
sentences.chinese: 单用火全治脊椎痛及足跟痛。

definition: to sneak in/to infiltrate/to be piercingly painful/to be unbearable (of pain, itch etc)
to feel unwell/to suffer pain/to be difficult to bear
to be so in pain as to not want to live/to be so grieved as to wish one were dead
to feel distressed about sth/heartache/cardiac pain
to throb with pain/throbbing pain/twang/pang/CL:陣|阵[zhen4]
variant of 癢|痒[yang3]/to itch/to tickle
